summary: This is an email correspondence between FBI personnel regarding the upload of a document containing American Express transaction data related to the Epstein case. The email includes an attachment with transmittal documents and a password, and references checking the DOJ document website.

events.title: AMEX Document Upload
events.description: FBI personnel correspond about uploading American Express transaction documents to the DOJ website, with attached transmittal documents and password.

keyFacts: The document references American Express transaction data being produced in the Epstein investigation.
A password-protected PDF attachment containing transmittal documents was included with the email.
The FBI had previously uploaded this document to the DOJ document website.
The correspondence occurred on August 28, 2020 regarding document EFTA00151453.
